pageContext.title: Wanted / Pursued
pageContext.description:
//"I think they saw us." -- Tana
Someone or something powerful or dangerous is seeking you out, and you'd rather not be found.
You risk discovery if you present yourself to guards, spies, or allies. There might be a bounty on you, or hunters after you.
You can spend a scene getting out of the area, or resolving the reason you're wanted.

front.name: Wanted
front.desc:
//"I think they saw us." -- Tana
Someone or something powerful or dangerous is seeking you out, and you'd rather not be found.
You risk discovery if you present yourself to guards, spies, or allies. There might be a bounty on you, or hunters after you.
You can spend a scene getting out of the area, or resolving the reason you're wanted.
prompts: You broke the law or offended someone
You're in a heavily guarded area and people are suspicious
You've done something to attract official attention
You're in a dangerous animal's territory
front.rule: Flip to worsen the condition and get a hit. Discard by spending a scene attending to the condition.

back.name: Pursued
back.desc:
//"They definitely saw us!" -- Basler
You are being actively hunted, by someone or something that wishes you ill.
You must stay hidden from searchers, conceal or disguise yourself when in the open, or take other steps to avoid attention.
Your pursuers might have some idea about your immediate goals, and work to thwart them as well.
You can spend downtime to leave the area or throw the searchers off your trail.
prompts: You're in enemy territory or surrounded
back.rule: Discard by spending downtime attending to the condition.
